title: (x) 'Studio Gaven': Who can ID this font the quickest? - Times Bold {Jan}
content:
Need to know what font is used for the "Studio Gaven" portion of the logo at the top of the page.

Thanks!!
author: OcularInk

comments.content: Oops! Here you go, Jan. Thanks! [http://studiogaven.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014005131/http:/studiogaven.com/ "http://studiogaven.com/")
